title.rendered: Professional Social Innovation & Management International Scholarships 2024

content.rendered:
The WU Executive Academy scholarship is open to support high-potential female applicants to achieve their educational and career goals. The scholarships are open for applicants for whom financing the tuition fee is a challenge.

Eligibility:

  • Applicants must demonstrate significant difficulty in raising sufficient financing for their program.
  • Applicants must be proficient in written and spoken English or German language.
  • Applicants must be International students

Eligible Countries: International

Type of scholarship: Masters

Value of Awards: Up to 25% of the tuition fee.

Number of Awards: UnKnown

Eligible Field of Studies: The sponsorship will be awarded in Professional Master Social Innovation & Management.

Method of Application: Applicants have to take admitted to the master’s degree program at the university. After being enrolled, please select the program and scholarship you are applying for through the online application form

Application Deadline: January 31

Screening Date: Yet to be announced.

For More information, Visit The Official Website
